languages.text: "В день совершеннолетия ко всем ткачам приходит великое испытание — год непрерывного бдения. Мы проводим его в нескончаемой молитве Неумирающему, и когда голод и прочие низменные чувства отступают... приходит истинное осознание себя и своего места в этом мире. Место между нежизнью и несмертью. Мы были горды. Ибо Он принял нас полностью, а мы приняли Его".

"When we came of age, we faced a great trial — a year-long vigil spent in unceasing prayer to the Undying One. When hunger and other base sensations faded away... we attained true comprehension of ourselves and our place in the world. Our place between life and death. We were proud, for on that day, He truly accepted us, and we accepted Him."
languages.original_text: "В день совершеннолетия ко всем ткачам приходит великое испытание — год непрерывного бдения. Мы проводим его в нескончаемой молитве Неумирающему, и когда голод и прочие низменные чувства отступают... приходит истинное осознание себя и своего места в этом мире. Место между нежизнью и несмертью. Мы были горды. Ибо Он принял нас полностью, а мы приняли Его".

traits.locale_text: "On the day of their coming of age, a great trial comes to every weaver: the year-long vigil. We spend it in unceasing prayer to the Undying One, and once hunger and other base sensations have retreated... we attain true comprehension of ourselves and our place in the world. A place between unlife and undeath. We felt proud. For He had accepted us, completely, and we had accepted Him."

"On the day of their coming of age, a great trial comes to every weaver: the year-long vigil. We spend it in unceasing prayer to the Undying One, and once hunger and other base sensations have retreated... we attain true comprehension of ourselves and our place in the world. A place between unlife and undeath. We felt proud. For He had accepted us, completely, and we had accepted Him."

"Every weaver faces a great trial when they come of age — a year-long vigil spent in unceasing prayer to the Undying One. When hunger and the other base sensations fade away... we attain true comprehension of ourselves and our place in the world. We learn to live between life and death. This trial is a matter of great pride among the weavers. It is proof of our devotion to Him, and of His devotion to us."

"Every weaver faces a great trial when they come of age — a year-long vigil spent in unceasing prayer to the Undying One. When hunger and the other base sensations fade away... we attain true comprehension of ourselves and our place in the world. We learn to live between life and death. This trial is a matter of great pride among the weavers. It is proof of our devotion to Him, and of His devotion to us."

"When we came of age, we faced a great trial — a year-long vigil spent in unceasing prayer to the Undying One. When hunger and other base sensations faded away... we attained true comprehension of ourselves and our place in the world. Our place between life and death. We were proud, for on that day, He truly accepted us, and we accepted Him."

"When we came of age, we faced a great trial — a year-long vigil spent in unceasing prayer to the Undying One. When hunger and the other base sensations faded away... we attained true comprehension of ourselves and our place in the world. Our place between life and death. We were proud, for on that day, He truly accepted us, and we accepted Him."

languages.text: «Al cumplir la mayoría de edad, nos enfrentamos a una gran ordalía: una vigilia de un año que pasamos en incesante oración al Inmortal. Cuando por fin desaparecen el hambre y los demás instintos primarios... ahí es cuando alcanzamos el verdadero entendimiento de nuestro propio ser y nuestro lugar en el mundo. Nuestro lugar entre la vida y la muerte. Y nos enorgullecemos de ello, pues ese es el día en que Él nos acepta a nosotros y nosotros lo aceptamos a Él».
languages.original_text: "When we came of age, we faced a great trial — a year-long vigil spent in unceasing prayer to the Undying One. When hunger and other base sensations faded away... we attained true comprehension of ourselves and our place in the world. Our place between life and death. We were proud, for on that day, He truly accepted us, and we accepted Him."

traits.locale_text: «Al cumplir la mayoría de edad, nos enfrentamos a una gran ordalía: una vigilia de un año que pasamos en incesante oración al Inmortal. Cuando por fin desaparecen el hambre y los demás instintos primarios... ahí es cuando alcanzamos el verdadero entendimiento de nuestro propio ser y nuestro lugar en el mundo. Nuestro lugar entre la vida y la muerte. Y nos enorgullecemos de ello, pues ese es el día en que Él nos acepta a nosotros y nosotros lo aceptamos a Él».

languages.text: 「私たちは成人すると、大いなる試練に直面したの。不死の者への絶え間ない祈りに明け暮れる一年の祈祷。飢えや他の基本的な感覚が消え去った時…私たちは自分自身や、世界の中における自分の立ち位置についての真の理解を得た。生と死の間のどこに存在するのか。あの日、私たちは誇らしく思っていたわ。主が私たちを真に受け入れてくださり、私たちは主を受け入れたのだと」
languages.original_text: "When we came of age, we faced a great trial — a year-long vigil spent in unceasing prayer to the Undying One. When hunger and other base sensations faded away... we attained true comprehension of ourselves and our place in the world. Our place between life and death. We were proud, for on that day, He truly accepted us, and we accepted Him."

traits.locale_text: 「私たちは成人すると、大いなる試練に直面したの。不死の者への絶え間ない祈りに明け暮れる一年の祈祷。飢えや他の基本的な感覚が消え去った時…私たちは自分自身や、世界の中における自分の立ち位置についての真の理解を得た。生と死の間のどこに存在するのか。あの日、私たちは誇らしく思っていたわ。主が私たちを真に受け入れてくださり、私たちは主を受け入れたのだと」

languages.text: “当我们成年时，我们会面临真正的试炼——长达一年之久的守夜，一刻不停地向不死之神祈祷。当饥饿与其他最基本的感觉慢慢消失时……我们便真正地理解了我们在这个世界中的存在，找到了处于生死之间的位置。我们为此感到骄傲，因为在那一天，祂真正地接纳了我们，而我们也接纳了祂。”
languages.original_text: "When we came of age, we faced a great trial — a year-long vigil spent in unceasing prayer to the Undying One. When hunger and other base sensations faded away... we attained true comprehension of ourselves and our place in the world. Our place between life and death. We were proud, for on that day, He truly accepted us, and we accepted Him."

traits.locale_text: “当我们成年时，我们会面临真正的试炼——长达一年之久的守夜，一刻不停地向不死之神祈祷。当饥饿与其他最基本的感觉慢慢消失时……我们便真正地理解了我们在这个世界中的存在，找到了处于生死之间的位置。我们为此感到骄傲，因为在那一天，祂真正地接纳了我们，而我们也接纳了祂。”

languages.text: "Als wir erwachsen wurden, erwartete uns eine große Prüfung – eine einjährige Wache mit ununterbrochenem Gebet zum Todlosen. Als der Hunger und die anderen Grundbedürfnisse nachließen ... erlangten wir wahres Verständnis von uns selbst und unserem Platz in der Welt. Unserem Platz zwischen Leben und Tod. Wir waren stolz, denn an diesem Tag hat Er uns wahrhaftig akzeptiert, genau wie wir ihn."
languages.original_text: "When we came of age, we faced a great trial — a year-long vigil spent in unceasing prayer to the Undying One. When hunger and other base sensations faded away... we attained true comprehension of ourselves and our place in the world. Our place between life and death. We were proud, for on that day, He truly accepted us, and we accepted Him."

traits.locale_text: "Als wir erwachsen wurden, erwartete uns eine große Prüfung – eine einjährige Wache mit ununterbrochenem Gebet zum Todlosen. Als der Hunger und die anderen Grundbedürfnisse nachließen ... erlangten wir wahres Verständnis von uns selbst und unserem Platz in der Welt. Unserem Platz zwischen Leben und Tod. Wir waren stolz, denn an diesem Tag hat Er uns wahrhaftig akzeptiert, genau wie wir ihn."

languages.text: « Quand nous avons atteint la majorité, nous avons été soumis à une grande épreuve : une veille longue d'une année entière à prier constamment l'Immortel. Lorsque la faim et les autres sensations primordiales ont fini par disparaître... nous avons accédé à la véritable compréhension, de nous-mêmes et de notre place dans le monde. Notre place entre la vie et la mort. Ce fut pour nous une immense fierté, car en ce jour de grâce, Il nous a acceptés, et nous L'avons accepté en retour. »
languages.original_text: "When we came of age, we faced a great trial — a year-long vigil spent in unceasing prayer to the Undying One. When hunger and other base sensations faded away... we attained true comprehension of ourselves and our place in the world. Our place between life and death. We were proud, for on that day, He truly accepted us, and we accepted Him."

traits.locale_text: « Quand nous avons atteint la majorité, nous avons été soumis à une grande épreuve : une veille longue d'une année entière à prier constamment l'Immortel. Lorsque la faim et les autres sensations primordiales ont fini par disparaître... nous avons accédé à la véritable compréhension, de nous-mêmes et de notre place dans le monde. Notre place entre la vie et la mort. Ce fut pour nous une immense fierté, car en ce jour de grâce, Il nous a acceptés, et nous L'avons accepté en retour. »

We were proud, for on that day, He truly accepted us, and we accepted Him."

languages.text: "Rüştümüzü ispatlama yaşında büyük bir sınavla yüzleştik... Tüm yıl durmaksızın Ölmeyen'e dua ederek nöbet tuttuk. Açlık ve diğer adi hisleri ardımızda bırakınca... Kendimizi ve dünyadaki yerimizi gerçekten idrak etmeyi başardık. Yaşamla ölüm arasındaki görevimizi idrak ettik. Gururla dolduk çünkü o gün hem O bizi gerçekten kabul etmişti hem de biz O'nu."
languages.original_text: "When we came of age, we faced a great trial — a year-long vigil spent in unceasing prayer to the Undying One. When hunger and other base sensations faded away... we attained true comprehension of ourselves and our place in the world. Our place between life and death. We were proud, for on that day, He truly accepted us, and we accepted Him."
